channel.title: Training on Sam Adesoga's Personal Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Training on Sam Adesoga's Personal Blog

item.title: Screenshare tool for my trainings
item.description: Occasionally i invite people round to my house for testing or automation training which sometimes i find inconvenient. In other situation, someone on other side of town need my help and i cant. I have recently come across the tool - join.me and it is awesome, it allow mwe to share my screen with people and you can give them control ove your machine as well. I think this is great !
